ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Follow up (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I got my current job (and the one before that) because of the Live Action Role Playing club I belong to.  Grei (who used to post on here a while back) used
ygData.messageBody:
At 11:02 AM 3/8/00 -0700, you wrote:
>From: "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>
>
>Not as scary as you think. I saw a gaming book on the desk of my then boss
>at my current job at my interview and struck up a conversation on it. When
>he found out I was a role player he said he was sure I'd fit in real well.
>Since I got the interview thru another gaming friend whose wife worked here,
>there's no doubt gaming played a huge role in my getting this gig. We have
>about 15 EQ players in Development alone out of about 45 employees in the
>dept.


I got my current job (and the one before that) because of the Live Action
Role Playing club I belong to. Grei (who used to post on here a while
back) used to work at this place, then moved to Seattle. When they started
hiring again, he recommended me, and they took me sans interview, based on
his recommendation alone. Gotta love friends in high places ;)

Talies the Wanderer
